meanings.definition: Kroons (noun): The basic monetary unit of Estonia.
meanings.sent1: I saved up all my kroons to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent2: In Estonia, people use kroons to buy groceries.
meanings.sent3: The kroons in my piggy bank jingled happily.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up like kroons in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The sound of kroons clinking together was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: Kroons (verb): To make a loud, harsh noise.
meanings.sent1: The thunder kroons scared the little puppy.
meanings.sent2: The old door kroons loudly whenever it's opened.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the vase, causing it to kroons on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The wind kroons through the trees on stormy nights.
meanings.sent5: The kettle began to kroons as it reached boiling point.
